name: Lash Lift Kit - Complete Set for Eyelash Lifting - New Pro Version - Easy to Apply and Long Lasting Finish - Professional Results up to 8 Weeks from Home- Includes 3 Applications

2024 Latest Innovation - Experience the next level of eyelash enhancement with our newly upgraded Lash Lift Kit. Featuring an advanced, high-precision adhesive formula, this kit ensures flawless application and exceptional hold, transforming your lash routine with ease and efficiency.

Exceptionally Easy Application - Achieve professional-quality lash curls at home with our user-friendly kit. Each set includes perfectly portioned, easy-to-follow steps complemented by varied-sized lift pads to fit all eye shapes. Ideal for beginners and experts alike, our kit makes lash lifting straightforward and stress-free.

Superior and Safe Ingredients - Our Lash Lift Kit is expertly formulated with the highest quality, non-irritating ingredients that are hypoallergenic, safe, and cruelty-free. Enjoy the premium salon experience without the risk, perfect for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

Lasting Beauty, Minimal Upkeep - Say goodbye to daily curling and frequent salon visits. Our Lash Lift Kit offers a spectacular semi-permanent curl that lasts up to 8 weeks. Enjoy beautiful, lifted lashes with minimal maintenance.

Comprehensive Kit for Multiple Uses - Each kit provides up to three full applications, complete with all necessary tools and treatments. Our single-use packets ensure freshness and hygiene, making each application as effective as the last.

name: Lash Lift and Black Kit, Easy At-Home DIY Lash Perm and Eyelash & Brow Color Set 3-in-1 with Upgraded Glue, Quick Lift & Voluminous Color Salon-Grade with Complete Tools for Beginners & Professionals
short_description: 3-IN-1 KIT: Lashes define your eyes. Our comprehensive kit performs eyelash lifting, black coloring, and volumizing—giving your lashes stunning shine, fullness, and vitality. Achieve a naturally gorgeous look with effortless elegance. IMPORTANT: Always conduct a skin test 24 hours prior to application.

INSTANTLY VISIBLE RESULTS: The perfect starter kit for achieving fuller eyelashes, lifting them into glossy volume with a lengthened appearance. See the difference immediately—voluminous black lashes that lock in your stunning look!

EASY AT-HOME DIY: Works with all lash lengths and shapes, even short lashes. Includes five silicone rod sizes (S, M, M1, M2, L) for different lengths and curl intensities. Choose the pad that fits your eye shape for stunning results. Made with natural, hypoallergenic ingredients, it’s gentle on lashes and skin—safe and easy to use.

ACHIEVE A MEGA & BLACK EYES LOOK: Enjoy lifted, dark lashes that last 4 weeks. Wake up daily to effortlessly voluminous lashes with minimal upkeep. Maintaining the perfect curl is easier than ever—no more need for lash extensions or thick layers of mascara.

SAVE TIME AND MONEY: Includes all the necessary tools for the process, with one kit accommodating up to 15 people. A single purchase provides enough supplies for 6 months of eyelash lifting. For optimal results when performing an eyelash lift, evenly apply adhesive to the lift pads, ensuring full coverage. Allow the glue to set for 2 minutes until it becomes tacky, then gently press the lashes onto the lift pads.

short_description: 【 Dual Adhesives for a Perfect Hold – No More Lifting Pads Falling OffUnlike most kits with only one glue, our 2-in-1 system includes Lift Pads Adhesive (to secure pads on eyelids) and Glue Balm (to attach lashes to pads). Each serves a unique purpose for a zero-slip, frustration-free lifting experience — smooth, secure, and perfectly in place every time.

【Ultra-Soft Transparent Lift Pads – Gentle, Flexible, and Crystal Clear】Made from upgraded crystal-clear silicone, our lift pads are softer, more flexible, and more skin-friendly than the cloudy, rigid pads found elsewhere. They naturally grip the eyelid and stay put with our adhesive — no sliding, no popping off, just a comfortable and stable lash lift every time.

【Salon-Quality Results at Home – For Both Lashes & Brows】Get fuller, feathered brows and beautifully curled lashes in just 30 minutes. The effects last 6–8 weeks, giving you a fresh, lifted look every morning without daily curling or brow styling. Enjoy professional salon results from the comfort of your home.

【Gentle & Nourishing Formula – Safe for All Skin Types】Our tested, non-irritating lotions are gentle yet effective. Infused with nourishing ingredients, they protect, condition, and strengthen both lashes and brows throughout the lifting process. Always cruelty-free and vegan-friendly for worry-free beauty.

【 Multiple Uses – Great Value for Money】Each kit provides enough solution and tools for multiple sessions, making it a cost-effective alternative to pricey salon visits. Enjoy long-lasting, professional-quality lash and brow lifts again and again — anytime you want.
